name: Mechanical Survivor
description:
This game is a kind of bullet screen shooting game that combines the basic combat of Roque EXE with light Rogue elements
The game is developed for one person.

It is a bullet screen shooting game that combines the rougelike element. It is easy to play

Players need to operate character movement and attack
The role has general attack and active skills
Passive or active skills can be selected for each role upgrade

There are plenty of passive and active skills to choose from during the battle. Players can match active and passive skills according to their own choices and strategies. Find their own rhythm in the fierce battle

There are only three optional characters in the game. More characters will be updated later
